comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I'll be at the project update meeting at noon today. Good luck evading the Northwest Passage goon squad.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Both my toe and quads are not quite up to that level of pedal mashing just yet. On the advice of my surgeon I'll be out jogging at Chautauqua. I'm getting a little bit better every day.

comments.author: Fuller
comments.body: Ready to roll but would be open for an alternate route avoiding dirt/gravel if doable ... David
